actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A resolution relating to an investigation of the death of former President Kennedy.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Select Committee to Study Governmental Operations with respect to Intelligence Activities to investigate matters relating to the death of former President John F. Kennedy. Authorizes access to any information relating to the death of the former President. Requires the select committee to make a final report to the Senate at the earliest possible date.

titles.title: A resolution relating to an investigation of the death of former President Kennedy.
